tool_description: Real-time Stock, Cryptocurrency, and Forex market data from NASDAQ, NYSE, LSE, MYX, IDX, Binance, FTX, PancakeSwap, Uniswap, FRED etc.
name: Stock Cryptocurrency Forex Market Data
title: Stock Cryptocurrency Forex Market Data

api_list.name: Search Exchange
api_list.description: Search exchanges by query or category

api_list.name: Get TimeFrames
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-cryptocurrency-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com/get/timeframes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-cryptocurrency-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
